name: Zen Chess: Mate in One
description: ZenChess: Mate in One is a minimalist chess puzzle game. Solve mate-in-one problems in a beautifully designed chess board.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any
